subject: THE BRITISH FINANCE INTELLIGEN
body:
THE BRITISH FINANCE INTELLIGENCE AGENCY
35 LANARK SQUARE, LONDON
FROM THE DESK OF GARY WINSTON,
My name is Gary Winston chief operating officer of the British finance intelligence agency this office has a mandate to recover unpaid debts
associated with NNPC contracts in Africa, Lottery fund, inheritance fund, loans and grants etc ranging from $1M-$50.5M owed to various beneficiaries and companies across the globe (Asia, Europe, USA, Africa, and Australia the Caribbeans)being the mandate given by the G8 MEMBER NATIONS WORLD INDUSTRIALIZED NATIONS AND, BACK BY THE ICPC IN HAGUE, AND THE WORLD BANK.
In the course of our investigation, your email address/particulars were shortlisted among the first individuals yet to be paid hence this message However, we received a petition today from your  relation that you are sick .
According to her, you were sick of terminal sickness and life threatening   that  funds should be paid to her as the heir apparent. She has also submitted her Bank account details for the transfer of the funds to her.To avoid undue delay or paying the fund to the wrong individual/beneficiary,
I have decided to contact you for confirmation. If I fail to hear from you .
After 72 hours, it would be assumed that the petition of your  relation  is true and the fund will be paid to her without further delay.
Therefore,
 if you are still alive, reconfirm your particulars,
. Address:
. Nationality:
Date of Birth:
.Current Occupation:
. Functioning mobile phone number
. 
Copy of your scanned driver license or any means of identification very important
.
All submitted information will be treated strictly private and confidential and duly processed for the release of the funds to you.
Please respond as quickly as possible and no third party .
Thank you.sincerely yours
GARY WINSTON
[This e-mail contains confidential information intended only for the
addressee(s). Information in or attached to it may be privileged,
confidential or protected by law. If you are not the addressee (or a
person responsible for delivering this transmission to the addressee)
you are strictly prohibited from reading, copying, disseminating or
distributing it. If you have received this e-mail in error please
delete it and any attachments from your system and destroy any print
outs you may have made. Thank you.

subject: Re: THE BRITISH FINANCE INTELLIGEN
body:
Hello Gary Winston,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the recovery of unpaid debts associated with various contracts. I appreciate the information you have provided.

Could you please clarify which specific NNPC contracts in Africa are being referred to? Additionally, how does the British finance agency typically handle such debt recovery processes?

I am interested in learning more about the procedures involved and how I can assist in providing the necessary information for the release of funds.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mildred
